content: Are there any tools that generate CDA CCDs from FHIR structures?

Next week there is a CDA connecthon where a working group will be presenting work on this subject and there will be a set of tools available that can used for FHIR to CCD transformations. for more https://www.hl7.org/events/c-cda/implementation/2021/10/

@AbdulMalik Shakir I heard that some transforms for use with the C-CDA on FHIR IG had been produced, http://hl7.org/fhir/us/ccda/the_specification.html, but I don't seem them published with the IG. @Rick Geimer can you provide the link to the transforms that accompanied this IG?
